title: Relates to an order of recognizance or bail
summary: Allows a superior court to order bail or recognizance for a defendant who has been convicted of a class A-II felony if the defendant is providing, or has agreed to provide material assistance pursuant to paragraph (b) of subdivision 1 of section 65.00 of the penal law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to an order of recognizance or bail
